title: 如何解决菜单插件与市场插件的BUG
author: MC_LengGuang
txt_content:
服务器是本来有菜单[ChestCommands]插件的


服务器安装GlobalMarket用不了 一点击要购买的物品就像普通背包一样可以把物品拖到物品栏.但是不能用

有大神么？

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
1.配置错误好像不可能
2.没加   KEEP-OPEN:true

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content:
如果是ChestCommands与交易的BUG

那我只能引用这句话了

Quote from filoghost:
Having problems with shops, more specifically given amounts of materials are wrong? It's a Bukkit bug, please update!

但是看你这个好像是两个插件都调用物品栏，冲突？

replies.author: HWJ424
replies.txt_content: 卧槽 GlobalMarket是双击购买啊
